agreement_alert: Please first view and agree to the "User Agreement".
assign_pay_dialog_content: The identity info entered differs from that linked to the current ___<BRAND>___ account. Use the ___<BRAND>___ account linked with your bank card and verify again.
bind_new_card_section_footer: For security reasons, currently linked cards will be unlinked.
bind_new_card_section_header: Link new card to retrieve account
bind_new_card_to_pay_tip: Enter payment password to verify identity
bind_new_card_to_reset_mobile_desc: Link a mobile number by linking a new card.
cannot_receive_sms_code_content: SMS code has been sent to your mobile number registered with your bank. Make sure you are currently using this mobile number and the SMS code hasn't been blocked by any security apps. If you no longer use this number, contact your bank. For more help, call ___<OfficialEntity_Service>___ at +86-0755-95017.
card_holder_dialog_content:
1. To ensure the security of funds, a ___<BRAND_ID>___ can only link bank cards held in the same name.

2. To link a card held in another name, you must update your real-name information.

3. After changing real-name information, old cardholder information will be deleted and you will only be able to add cards in the new cardholder name.
card_holder_section_header: Enter the information your previously provided to your bank. Only bank cards held in this name can be added in the future.
card_number_input_tips_title: No fees or online banking required
check_pay_pwd_page_desc: Enter your payment password to confirm your identity
check_sms_desc:
Verification code has been sent to the mobile number you registered at your bank.

1. Confirm that this is your current mobile number registered at your bank.

2. Check if the SMS has been blocked by a security app on your mobile.

3. If you cannot access this number right now, please contact your bank.

4. For additional assistance, call Customer Service at 95017.
check_sms_page_desc: Linking bank card requires SMS verification. Verification code sent to phone {}. Follow the instructions.
coupon_change_should_change_payment: Payment amount has changed. Please reselect.
cvv_dialog_content: The CVV is the 3 or 4 digit security code either on the back or front of your card.
cvv_item_place_holder: 3 or 4 digits usually on back of card
fill_card_info_card_holder_assign_pay_he: Must be designated cardholder to pay.

lqt_reset_mobile_desc: Select a bank card. Verify your Mini Fund using your mobile number held by that card's bank.
mobile_dialog_content: The mobile number registered on your bank account is the one you provided the bank when opening the account. If you didn't provide a mobile number to the bank, you have forgotten it, or it is no longer accessible, contact your bank and update the mobile number.

offline_show_code_warning: Only use the payment code number to show cashiers when paying. For your security, don't share it with anyone else.
offline_view_code_warning: Only use the payment code number to show cashiers when paying. For your security, don't share it with anyone else.
paying_alert_tips: Payment already submitted. Wait for the payment result message to check if you need to resubmit payment.

reset_phone_tip: You can pay once identity is verified. To confirm the phone number held by your bank, call
safety_dialog_content:
Security measures: Account protection, real-time monitoring, emergency freezing. 

Two-step verification: Your payment password is required for each payment. SMS verification is required for large payments. 

Privacy protection: Strong data encryption is used to protect user data. 

Payment insurance: Payments are insured by PICC.
send_verify_code_tips_format:
SMS verification code will be sent to: 
{}
set_pay_pwd_page_desc: Set a ___<BRAND_Pay>___ password to verify your payments

succ_page_open_face_id_dialog_content: Enable Face Pay to use face recognition to complete payments quickly and securely.
succ_page_open_touch_id_dialog_content: Enable Touch Pay to use fingerprint recognition to complete payments quickly and securely.
user_card_type_select_placeholder_v2: Select bank card and card type
verify_cre_tip: Enter the last 4 digits of {}'s {} to verify identity
wxp_network_error: System is busy. Try again later.
wxp_payment_network_error: Transaction submitted. You will receive a payment status notification from the ___<BRAND_Pay>___ Official Account. Confirm payment status before resubmitting the payment if necessary.

wxp_wcpay_system_error: System is busy. Try again later.
Card_UserAgreement_Title: To add bank cards, it is necessary to agree to the terms in the agreement below.
pay_settings_delay_transfer_page_desc: Once accepted, the funds will be deposited to the other user's Balance by the following time. Transfer cannot be recalled after sending, so check the payee's information carefully before transferring.
